channel.title: How an 1803 Jacquard Loom Led to Computer Technology :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Notes About This Selection In this video, we get to see another example of antique computers! Created in 1803, the Jacquard loom used technology that would be a predecessor to the more modern punch cards and in turn, modern computers. As before with the difference engine and the Antikythera mechanism, this was a result of humans trying to automate tasks which required a lot of precision. Reference The Henry Ford.
